abstract: In a round of budget tightening, the Pentagon said that it would stretch out purchases, cancel a high-flying spy drone and delay work on a new missile submarine.
snippet: In a round of budget tightening, the Pentagon said that it would stretch out purchases, cancel a high-flying spy drone and delay work on a new missile submarine.
lead_paragraph: As the Pentagon Thursday announced changes in its programs, military contractors were bracing for cancellations or cutbacks of several programs.

headline.main: Spy Drone and Missile Sub Are on Military’s Budget-Cutting List
headline.print_headline: Spy Drone and Missile Sub Are on Military’s Budget-Cutting List

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

abstract: Standard & Poor’s lowered its outlook on the Jefferies Group and Cantor Fitzgerald to negative from stable, saying the European debt crisis could weigh on their profits.
snippet: Standard & Poor’s lowered its outlook on the Jefferies Group and Cantor Fitzgerald to negative from stable, saying the European debt crisis could weigh on their profits.
lead_paragraph: Standard & Poor’s lowered its outlook on the Jefferies Group and Cantor Fitzgerald to negative from stable on Friday, expressing concern that the European debt crisis could weigh on profits at the brokerage firms and cause a decline in market activity.

headline.main: S.&P. Lowers Outlook on Jefferies and Cantor

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
